price: Deε wͻ’ka nesε: “Yakata y’akoma ho (enti yenhia asεm foforͻ biara bio). ”Daabi, wͻn boniayε ho nti Nyankopͻn adome wͻn, enti (wͻn mu) kakraa bi (anaasε asεm no mu kakraa bi) na wͻ’gye die.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ قُلُوبُنَا غُلۡفُۢۚ بَل لَّعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِكُفۡرِهِمۡ فَقَلِيلٗا مَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū qulūbunā ghul'fun bal laʿanahumu al-lahu bikuf'rihim faqalīlan mā yu'minūna
